Course Name: ACG 4201 - ADVANCED FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS II
Course Title: ADVANCED FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS II
Course Description: THE SECOND ADVANCED FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS COURSE CONTINUES THE STUDY OF FINANCIAL CONCEPTS RELATED TO BUSINESS COMBINATIONS. AREAS COVERED INCLUDE ACCOUNTING FOR BRANCH OPERATIONS, FOREIGN CURRENCY CONCEPTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, SEGMENT AND INTERIM FINANCIAL REPORTING, AND THE FORMATION, OPERATION, DISSOLUTION, AND LIQUIDATION OF PARTNERSHIPS AND GOVERNMENTAL AND NOT-FOR-PROFIT ACCOUNTING. (THIS COURSE MAY BE TAKEN INDEPENDENT OF ACG4200.)
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
